quotes.quote: If I have to hurt someone, if I have to injure a comrade, then I might as well hurt myself.

Now listen up, any power that surpasses reason, still comes from reason, right? Magic isn't some kind of miraculous power. It is a talent that only works when the flow of energy inside of us and the flow of energy in the natural world are in perfect synchronization. To perform magic one must have a strong mind and the ability to focus. It should take over your being and come pouring out of your soul! If all we do is worry about following rules, then our magic will never progress.

The mistakes people make are eventually labeled as experience. But with a true mistake, there will be no experience to be gained. Because the mistake you made taking me as your opponent will leave you with no future.
If you don't have the courage to change things then you might as well just die!!!
Mistakes are not shackles that halt one from stepping forward. Rather, they are that which sustain and grow one's heart.
I wont stop fighting when im tired, i'll stop fighting when you've shattered my heart into a thousand pieces
I love flowers. They look so good... On me.
If you realize you made a mistake with the way you've been living your life, you just have to take the next moment and start over.
Bury the pain of losing your loved ones... into the arms of your friends.
I particularly dislike this emotion you call ANGER. It makes me lose sight of myself, you know. Just thinking of what happens to me if I'm not MYSELF. Disgusts me to no end.
Keeheehe. I like him. I'm going to make him my cat.
I refuse to stand by and watch you give up. I won't lose you, I can't. We'll walk away from this battle together.
Whether fairies have tails or not, or whether they even exist, nobody knows for sure. So it's like an eternal mystery, an eternal adventure.
Humans have faith too. It's important not to lose oneself. The strength to think, the courage not to run away.
I'll keep my promise, I'll save the world.
I wish I could go back to my childhood. It went by so quickly I feel like it was robbed from me.
I never rely on luck. It's all my own choice. It leads me to the future.
Fear is "evil", it tells your weakness. If you can know your weakness, people become strong and gentle.
Even if I can’t see you… Even if we are separated far apart from each other… I’ll always be watching after you. I’ll definitely watch over you forever…
Magic is anything you can think of. It can be felt in infinite ways... As light, as darkness, as red, as blue. It is living freely, together along side Fairy Tail.

They all grow up, the youths that are going to live in this era. Go forward, youths. Like a wind on a field. Your burning blood, sweat, and tears... are as beautiful as a parasol. Show no fear, youths.
Ice can even stop the time of life itself. So, you'll never be able to catch up, for eternity. You'll always be stuck there, staring at the fairy's tail.
Your darkness...I will...seal it...
What's the point of magic to begin with... if I can't use it to protect my friends?
It is love that can make us strong, but it is also love that can make us weak.
All I need is the power to be able to protect my comrades. So long as I can have the strength to do that, I don't care if I'm weaker than everyone else in the world.

That morning's dawn was painted a beautiful scarlet, the likes of which I had never seen before. Like the color of Erza's hair, it was warm and passionate... If she could only lift her face a beautiful sky would be spread out before her.
Care to little, you lose them. Care too much, you get hurt.
You donÂ´t need a reason to cry. All you need to feel the warmth that dwells in your chest.
Never look at your life as something insignificant. Never forget those friends of yours that you loved.
People cry, not because they're weak. Its because they've been strong for too long.
Manipulating the pieces according to your strategy... That is what defines a King.
There is great value in the time spent in ones own company, but a life time of total isolation is a fate no one should endure.
A strong person is not the one who doesn't cry. A strong person is the one who cries and sheds tears for a moment, then gets up and fights again.
No one can decide what someone else should do with their life.
There are things in this world that you cannot oppose, no matter how hard you try.

I won't give up, I will fight til the bitter end, cause there's no way I will back down after what you did to my friends. They are what made me the person I am today, that's why I'll keep fighting... For my friends!
Sadness is just another wall that blocks you from moving on. I know it's hard to get past it, but you got to break through.
Magic is not meant to be used to kill people... but without power we can't even protect the ones we love...
But what's important isn't the Magic, it's the heart of the wielder who uses it.
It's not a sin to fall in love. You can't even arrest someone over that.
Do you understand the sorrow of a star that cannot return to the heavens?
Mages of Fairy Tail... specialize in property damage!
Quit acting like a spoiled child. What's important, the memories? The keys? The feelings of guilt? No. It's the power to save your friends. That's the power of a celestial spirit wizard.
Everything doesn't have to be decided by life and death. Just think about the future.
Life and death are the very basis of all things. They intensify every emotion. Or, to put it in a rather different way, there is nothing quite so dull as "life".
What I want isn't money or pretty dresses, but a place that recognizes me as who I am. Fairy Tail is my other family, and it is a far more warming family than here!
Always trying to make myself seem strong... So I locked my own heart in a suit of armor.
If lives were lost today, then lives were also born. How important each day is... Depends on how important you feel it is to you.
Hurt me with the truth. But never comfort me with a lie.
If one really wants to change the world...they have to do it by their own hands!
Don't give up, the beginning is always the hardest, so let's keep on going till the very end.

I won't run, I will stand and look ahead to what I must do, I must face the fear, I won't let it control me anymore, I will use my heart that holds my courage and my bravery to move me forward to what I must do.

Everyone makes mistakes, but then you recover. Look at all of the friends you have here who adore you. It would be difficult for anything to change that. If you keep that in mind, you should be able to get back on your feet any number of times.
Even if I can't see you... No matter how far away you may be... I will always be watching you.
Don't judge me unless you have looked through my eyes, experienced what I went through and cried as many tears as me. Until then back-off, cause you have no idea.
All living things eventually die. It's unavoidable. But as long as you remember, it will live on in your heart forever.
In that case, you have nothing to fear. Mistakes aren’t made by locking your feelings away and holding back… They’re made while wearing your heart on your sleeve.
A flower can't choose the place where it blooms and a child can't choose the parents he's born to.
Missy, could you please lend me your underwear?

I'll always be by your side. You'll never be alone. You have as many hopes as there are stars that light up the sky. The wind that brushes your skin is a presentiment of tomorrow. Come, lets walk in time with the song of the fairies...
But we're alive, aren't we? We don't have any magic power, but we're alive! We have the strength to overcome the weakness and the fear! That's what it means to be alive!
Tears are how our heart speaks when your lips cannot describe how much we've been hurt.

I always cursed my own life. The anxiety, anger and hatred I couldn't suppress. However, when I stopped to look at the sky... I realized just how small I am. There is an endless world spreading before me.
When life changes to be harder, change yourself to be stronger.
There are people in this world who prefer solitude. But there is no one who can withstand it.
It is always sad to part with those whom you love, but your companions will help you bear that sadness.

Even if we walk on different paths, one must always live on as you are able! You must never treat your own life as something insignificant! You must never forget the friends you love for as long as you live! Let bloom the flowers of light within your hearts.
We'd rather die than abandon our comrade!!!
Comrades are comrades because they help each other out.
It is the role of a parent to stand in front of their children... and protect them even if their legs were to give out at any moment.
The worst kind of pain is when you're smiling just to stop the tears from falling.
There are walls that can't be broken through power alone. But if there is a power that can break through those walls, it is the power of feelings.
You must live life as long as you are still strong. Never look at your life as something insignificant.
If you truly desire greatness, you must first know what makes you weak!
I don't want... to run away by myself. Because no matter what, I'd rather be together with everyone...
*To Gajeel Redfox* You guys are complete idiots! I feel so sorry for you, I think I'm tearing up. Phantom Lord? The spirit ruler? What a joke; I'm not afraid of you at all!

The pain of getting hit, the frustration of loosing, the joy of winning, all of that. They've been driven into this body, fists, and this head. It becomes my strength in the next fight. All of my battles up to now, those memories, they are all of my power.
I don't care where I get hurt, as long as my injuries are visible.
Why do you find it easy to kill? These are lives dammit!
There's nothing happy about having your fate decided for you! You have to grab your own happiness!
Moving on doesn't mean you forget about things. It just means you have to accept what's happened and continue living.

If someone here were hurt or lost their life because of me, I think I would also be in pain much like Loke. But, it’ll be all right. If everyone works together and unites in power, we can overcome any pinch ahead, right?
The fact that I’m standing here means that I’m resolved to fight for my guild. I do not need your sympathy. As long as I’m still standing, please come at me with all you’ve got! Please do!
You can believe in anything. But it's your heart...That ultimately decides.

If I haven't had fear, then I also wouldn't have been able to know what it's like to have bravery in my heart.
Bravery that awakens when you're being consumed by fear.
Comrade isn't simply a word. Comrades are about heart. It's the unconditional trust in your partners. Please, feel free to lean on me.... And I, too, will lean on you as well.
Feelings can be controlled, but tears never lie.
It's not the goodbyes that hurt, it's the flashbacks that follow...
If the drive behind one's actions is the thought for another, then it is never meaningless.
I am an ice sculpture mage. I can make anything.
I find no fault with you when it comes to standing against your enemy with courage. However, every few have the strength to sheath their sword once it's out.
I haven't relied on luck since the moment I was born. Everything has been the result of my choices. That is what leads my existence towards the future.
It's only the end if you give up!
I want to become a man who treasures his friends.
Remember that everyone you meet is afraid of something, loves something, and has lost something.
How can a snake fly? It's not even a man!
Your so called "hope" is to throw the past into despair?
Forget what hurt you in the past, but never forget what it taught you.
Listen up, brats! Today’s defeat is the seed for tomorrow’s victory! We’ll rise up and show them! We don’t know the meaning of giving up!

I don't think it's completely such a bad thing to cling to one single person, but you have any number of people all around you. People are always connected to one another. You see? Just reach out your hand, and there's someone right here. It's when people realize how lonely it is being on their own, that they start to become kind.
I will acknowledge you as my enemy and destroy you.
Take it, that courage you have locked in your heart. Awaken it, wipe your tears, be strong and use that courage.
My companions make my heart strong. If I'm fighting for those I love, I care not what happens to this body.
Inside my memories lies sad thoughts and it's hard to forget, but I try everyday to keep moving forward in life, so why can't you, living in saddness isn't living at all.
We all have the right to choose our own future. We should be able to walk the paths that we choose, not the future youÂ´ve decided for us.
Those painful memories are what help us make it to tomorrow and become stronger.
Someone who could shed tears for their friends... could never be rejected from Fairy Tail!
Memories are, in a word, learning. And there's no shame in learning from a formidable enemy!
Freedom can be found at the bottom of your heart.

Even if I can't see. Even if I can't hear. I have light inside me. The path I walked with my friends, is bringing light to my future. I don't fear anything! This isn't even worthy of being called pain! The worst pain is.. The pain of losing your light.
When people realize just how lonely they are on their own, they will become kind.
I love adventures.
I'll do what I want till the end. Cut me down if you want.

Maybe we can't help feeling scared alone! But we're all right here, together! We've got out friends close by!
Now there's nothing to fear, because we are not alone!
The time known as "LIFE", cannot be rewound.

We know our weakness. Now what will we do?
We'll get stronger! We'll get up and fight!
Do whatever you think is right. That's the way of the Fairy Tail mages.
There's no need to change the past. Because of the past we are who we are now. Every second, every action from then is linked to us here and now.
Being alive...is a sign of strength!
*To Pantherlily* We'll stop it, even if my body crumbles to bits, I'll stop it with my soul!
You have three choices, you can give up, give in or give it your all.
I will fight for my friends than watching them get hurt, I will fight for those I love.
There are people in this world that enjoy being alone, but there isn't a single person who can bear solitude.
The loneliest people are the kindest. The saddest people smile the brightest. The most damaged people are the wisest. All because they don't wish to see anyone else suffer the way they did.
The minute you think of giving up, think of the reason why you held on so long.
As long as you laugh at people's suffering, your goal will always be out of reach. If you never want to be defeated, you must first learn your own weakness, and always be kind.

There were many times I felt on the verge of giving up… And many times when I met with big trouble, and met with some really tough opponents… But during that time, he would always be there. And so would everyone else from the guild. Crying together, laughing together, so many of these things. Well, a lot of things really did take place… I’m sure that’s the way it should be… I’m sure that everybody carries a certain burden of their own. But even then, everyone tries their best to keep moving forward. That’s what makes Fairy Tail what it is. I really joined the best guild ever.
Stellar Spirits are not "Shields".
We don't have to know what tomorrow holds! That's why we can live for everything we're worth today!
Power is not the only connection you can have.  This world is filled with much warmer things.
The real sin is averting your eyes and failing to believe in anyone.
If this world continues to reject me, then I shall reject the world.
Don't think, Natsu! It's not like you!
They are your words! This is your heart! Our desire to help our friends belongs to us!
"Time" is proof that people have lived. Every person lives the time that has been given to them... that is life.
Why is it?.. I'm so sad and so lonely. But the tears just won't come.
We don't die for our friends, we live for them.
We can't live if we don't keep running forward.
Unwavering Faith and Resilient Bonds will bring even miracles to your side.
Sincere feelings transcend time and connect hearts.

Weaklings will stay weak forever. But weakness is not evil, since human beings are weak creatures to begin with. Alone, you feel nothing but insecurity; that's why we form guilds, that's why we have friends. We walk together in order to live a strong life. The clumsy ones will walk into more walls than the others, and it may also take them longer to get there. If you believe in tomorrow and put yourself out there, you can naturally obtain your strength. That's how you will be able to smile and live strong.
There are times in a man's life when he must STRIP
We are all different from each other and that's what makes us all special.
If you have love in your life, you must keep living.
Feelings are connection. They surpass time, and find their way back to the people you love.
You see, for as long as we draw breath into our lungs, we shall keep hope alive inside our hearts.
Fear isn't evil, it only allows us to learn our own weaknesses. When we learn our weakness, people can grow stronger and kinder.
Sorry, but it doesn't matter if you're a woman or even a child... I don't go easy on anybody who hurts my nakama.
If  you are lookin' back all the time, you'll never get ahead!
It's not a crime! Caring about your friends is not a crime!
I wonder how long... How long will I remain anchored at this harbor known as battle?
You're useless, Lucy. You can't understand a woman's heart.
Everyone exists for a reason. As small as it can be. I'm sure you have a meaning too.
Oh, guilds are organizations where wizards gather to share information and find work. You can't be considered a full-fledged wizard unless you're in a guild.
It doesn´t matter what day it is as long as you are happy.
Sometimes, mermaids can devour tigers.
No matter how hurt someone is, they're meant to overcome it and try to go forward.
You taught me what it means to love, and for that I will be eternally grateful.
After everything I've faced.... Having a future with you snatched away from me ...is definitely the most terrifying thing I've ever had to endure....
"Time" is proof that people have lived. Every person lives the time that has been given to them... that is life.
*To Gajeel Redfox* You guys are complete idiots! I feel so sorry for you, I think I\'m tearing up. Phantom Lord? The spirit ruler? What a joke; I\'m not afraid of you at all!
